mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "From the Floor", "Square Dance Date Book", "On the Record and Record Report", "Your Own Square Whenever You Desire It", "As I See It", "Leadership Training on the Local Level", "Clubs, the Backbone of Square Dancing", "Ladies on the Square: Pattern Patter", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "Overseas Dateline", "What Records Are They Using?", "Style Series: Some Theory on the Square Thru", "High Flying Square Dance Caller", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop", "The Caller of the Month: Walt Niezabitowski", "Paging the Roundancers: Bill and Elsye Johnson", "Gems from Other Publications", "Current Best Sellers: Record Sales Survey", "Verse in the Square Dance Vein", and "Experimental Lab: Switchback".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
